mapper.sql:
src.LOC_ID AS SL_LOC_ID, src.ADDRESS AS SL_ADDRESS,
dest.LOC_ID AS DL_LOC_ID, dest.ADDRESS AS DL_ADDRESS
TOURID, TOUR_TYPE, SOURCE_LOCID, DEST_LOCID, VEHICLE_ID, DRIVER_ID, SHIP_TO, PLAN_DEPART, PLAN_ARR, ACT_DEPART, ACT_ARR, ETA, EXE_STATUS, CUST_ID, CREATED_ON, CREATED_BY, DEL
mapper.select:
select
from t_tour t left join t_location src on t.SOURCE_LOCID = src.LOC_ID left join t_location dest on t.DEST_LOCID = dest.LOC_ID
AND t.TOURID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{tourid}),'%')
AND t.TOUR_TYPE LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{tourType}),'%')
AND t.SOURCE_LOCID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{sourceLocid}),'%')
AND t.DEST_LOCID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{destLocid}),'%')
AND t.VEHICLE_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{vehicleId}),'%')
AND t.DRIVER_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{driverId}),'%')
AND t.SHIP_TO LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{shipTo}),'%')
AND t.PLAN_DEPART LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{planDepart}),'%')
AND t.PLAN_ARR LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{planArr}),'%')
AND t.EXE_STATUS LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{exeStatus}),'%')
AND t.CUST_ID LIKE CONCAT(CONCAT('%',#{custId}),'%')
mapper.insert: insert into t_tour (TOURID, TOUR_TYPE, SOURCE_LOCID, DEST_LOCID, VEHICLE_ID, DRIVER_ID, SHIP_TO, PLAN_DEPART, PLAN_ARR, ACT_DEPART, ACT_ARR, ETA, EXE_STATUS, CUST_ID, CREATED_ON, CREATED_BY, DEL) values (#{tourid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{tourType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{sourceLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{destLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{shipTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{planDepart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{planArr,jdbcType=DATE}, #{actDepart,jdbcType=DATE}, #{actArr,jdbcType=DATE}, #{eta,jdbcType=DATE}, #{exeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createdOn,jdbcType=DATE}, #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into t_tour
TOURID,
TOUR_TYPE,
SOURCE_LOCID,
DEST_LOCID,
VEHICLE_ID,
DRIVER_ID,
SHIP_TO,
PLAN_DEPART,
PLAN_ARR,
ACT_DEPART,
ACT_ARR,
ETA,
EXE_STATUS,
CUST_ID,
CREATED_ON,
CREATED_BY,
DEL,
#{tourid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{tourType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{sourceLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{destLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{shipTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{planDepart,jdbcType=DATE},
#{planArr,jdbcType=DATE},
#{actDepart,jdbcType=DATE},
#{actArr,jdbcType=DATE},
#{eta,jdbcType=DATE},

#{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{createdOn,jdbcType=DATE},
#{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update t_tour
TOUR_TYPE = #{tourType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SOURCE_LOCID = #{sourceLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEST_LOCID = #{destLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
SHIP_TO = #{shipTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
PLAN_DEPART = #{planDepart,jdbcType=DATE},
PLAN_ARR = #{planArr,jdbcType=DATE},
ACT_DEPART = #{actDepart,jdbcType=DATE},
ACT_ARR = #{actArr,jdbcType=DATE},
ETA = #{eta,jdbcType=DATE},
EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED_ON = #{createdOn,jdbcType=DATE},
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where TOURID = #{tourid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update t_tour set TOUR_TYPE = #{tourType,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SOURCE_LOCID = #{sourceLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEST_LOCID = #{destLocid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, VEHICLE_ID = #{vehicleId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DRIVER_ID = #{driverId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SHIP_TO = #{shipTo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, PLAN_DEPART = #{planDepart,jdbcType=DATE}, PLAN_ARR = #{planArr,jdbcType=DATE}, ACT_DEPART = #{actDepart,jdbcType=DATE}, ACT_ARR = #{actArr,jdbcType=DATE}, ETA = #{eta,jdbcType=DATE}, EXE_STATUS = #{exeStatus,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CUST_ID = #{custId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED_ON = #{createdOn,jdbcType=DATE}, CREATED_BY = #{createdBy,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL = #{del,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where TOURID = #{tourid,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
